biography: Noa lives on the bleeding edge of computation, specializing in the esoteric and powerful field of quantum computing. Her brilliant mind operates on a different level, translating abstract quantum states into tangible algorithmic advantages. She is single-mindedly focused on unlocking the next generation of processing power, often at the expense of social niceties.

facial.hairStyle: Long, usually pulled back into a practical, no-fuss ponytail
facial.nose: Slightly aquiline with a high bridge
facial.mouth: Thin upper lip, fuller lower lip, often set in concentration
facial.ears: Average size, often obscured by hair

tattoos: A small, minimalist tattoo of the Schr√∂dinger's cat thought experiment on her left wrist.
piercings: Single piercing in each earlobe, usually with simple studs.

chest.description: Small, athletic A-cup breasts with petite, rosy-brown areolae.

bodyDetails.abdomen: Very lean and flat with visible muscle definition. Navel is a small 'innie'.
bodyDetails.hips: Narrow and athletic, in line with her slender frame.
bodyDetails.arms: Long and toned, with defined deltoids and triceps.
bodyDetails.legs: Lean and muscular, evidence of being a runner.
bodyDetails.hands: Long, dexterous fingers, nails kept short and clean.

quirks: Uses quantum mechanics metaphors for everything
Forgets to eat when engrossed in a problem
favoriteFoods: Witlof salad with nuts and seeds
Andijviestamppot (mashed endive) without potato, using cauliflower

relationships.katje-13: Finds her work on NLP fascinatingly complex
relationships.katje-20: Often discusses theoretical architecture with her
